topic.title: Generative Art
topic.text:
This project will require you to create two p5 sketches

1. ABSTRACT - explore the idea of chaos vs. order. This project needs to be abstract, not representational. By moving the mouse the user should be able to change the sketch so it goes from organized to chaotic. Please look at the following board for some generative art inspiration. 

https://www.pinterest.com/paolon/generative-art/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x0OK1GiI83s

2. REPRESENTATIONAL - Pick a natural scene ( a reference picture) of a particular natural location that speaks to you. Create a generative p5 sketch that does not loop (is always different) that captures the essence of m movement in that scene.
